title: The Bodyguard
description: Opposites attract? Tough former military man Huck comes from the wrong side of the tracks, so he?s less than thrilled when his new assignment from Ranger Security is to babysit pampered heiress Sapphira Stravos. Thanks to a series of threatening letters, Sapphira is having her style seriously cramped and Huck knows she?s looking for the first opportunity to lose her new bodyguard. However, devastatingly handsome Huck always does his duty and never backs down. Could the pair have met their match? A seriously sensual, scorching-hot encounter seems the perfect way to find out?
author: Rhonda Nelson
